name: Space War (itch) (WeAreHere)
description:
The year is 5000, your home planet, Sundar, has been invaded by aliens and a galactic war has started as they try to conquer your planet. You are a new pilot and are on your first solo mission to infiltrate the closes base in the Banuk galactic system to learn about their key weapon.



Update May 11, 2020 8:15 p.m.: Fixed UI errors and created higher difficulty.
